cpic_recommendation: Avoid codeine. Use non-CYP2D6-metabolized opioids.
Use lower dose with close monitoring. Consider alternative.
Standard dose codeine. No adjustment needed.

Avoid clopidogrel. Consider prasugrel or ticagrelor.
Consider alternative antiplatelet therapy or higher dose.
